original_text: So the Israelites had to ask the Philistines to mend their ploughs, axes, hoes and knives that they used on their farms.
korean_text: 온 이스라엘 사람들이 각기 보습이나 삽이나 도끼나 괭이를 벼리려면 블레셋 사람들에게로 내려갔었는데

sentences.original_text: So the Israelites had to ask the Philistines
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이스라엘 사람들은 블레셋 사람들에게 부탁해야 했습니다

sentences.original_text: to mend their ploughs, axes, hoes and knives
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 쟁기, 도끼, 괭이와 칼을 수리해 달라고

sentences.original_text: that they used on their farms
